name: Deepsea Salvor
description:
This highly randomized action roguelike is all about strategic positioning and using powerups to their fullest extent. Each upgrade you get is designed to make you play the game differently; adapt or die!

Features so far include:

  • Over 100 unique powerups
  • Enemies with randomized abilities
  • Thousands of battle arena layouts
  • 3 levels with unique bosses
